00037 /* function prototypes. */
00038 void print_usage (FILE * stream, cint exit_code);
00039 void print_version (FILE * stream, cint exit_code);
00040 void print_author (FILE * stream, cint exit_code);
00041 void print_license (FILE * stream, cint exit_code);

00043 /* functions. */
00044 
00057 void
00058 print_usage (FILE * stream, cint exit_code)
00059 {
00060   /* externs. */
00061 
00062   /* function externs. */
00063   extern const char *get_prog_name (void);
00064 
00065   /* variable externs. */
00066   extern cstring usage_part_a, usage_part_b;
00067   extern cstring usage_part_c, usage_part_d;
00068   extern cstring send_bugs_mail;
00069 
00070   /* print usage information. */
00071   fprintf (stream, "%s %s", _(usage_part_a), get_prog_name ());
00072   fprintf (stream, " %s%s", _(usage_part_b), NEW_LINE);
00073   fprintf (stream, "%s%s", NEW_LINE, _(usage_part_c));
00074   fprintf (stream, "%s%s%s", NEW_LINE, _(usage_part_d), NEW_LINE);
00075   fprintf (stream, "%s%s", _(send_bugs_mail), NEW_LINE);
00076 
00077   /* exit the program. */
00078   exit (exit_code);
00079 }
00080 
00093 void
00094 print_version (FILE * stream, cint exit_code)
00095 {
00096   /* externs. */
00097 
00098   /* variable externs. */
00099   extern cstring program_version;
00100 
00101   /* print and exit the program. */
00102   fprintf (stream, "%s%s", _(program_version), NEW_LINE);
00103   exit (exit_code);
00104 }

00118 void
00119 print_author (FILE * stream, cint exit_code)
00120 {
00121   /* externs. */
00122 
00123   /* variable externs. */
00124   extern cstring program_author;
00125 
00126   /* print and exit the program. */
00127   fprintf (stream, "%s%s", _(program_author), NEW_LINE);
00128   exit (exit_code);

00130 
00143 void
00144 print_license (FILE * stream, cint exit_code)
00145 {
00146   /* externs. */
00147 
00148   /* variable externs. */
00149   extern cstring license_part_a;
00150   extern cstring license_part_b;
00151   extern cstring license_part_c;
00152 
00153   /* print license info. */
00154   fprintf (stream, "%s", _(license_part_a));
00155   fprintf (stream, "%s", _(license_part_b));
00156   fprintf (stream, "%s", _(license_part_c));
00157 
00158   /* exit the program. */
00159   exit (exit_code);
00160 }
